\bentry

{\dictmeaning{
\num{1} (vayxkitxyanunx, pArxNiyanunx) benanxTiTx; aTiTxsikoMDu; anusarisi: 
\eng{run after the criminal} aparAdhiyanunx benanxTiTx ODu. 
\num{2} (vayxkitx, vasutx, 
jAcnxna, \mo vanunx) arasikoMDu; huDukikoMDu; anevxVSisikoMDu: \eng{scientists go seeking 
after truth} vijAcnxnigaLu satayxvanunx arasikoMDu, huDukikoMDu--hoVgutAtxre. 
\num{3} hiMde: 
\eng{please shut the door after you} dayamADi ninanx hiMde bAgilanunx hAkikoMDu hoVgu. 
\eng{man after man} obabx vayxkitxya hiMde inonxbabx vayxkitx. 
\num{4} (vayxkitx yA vasutxvina) 
bagege; vicAravAgi: \eng{ask after her} avaLa yoVga keSxVmavanunx vicArisu. 
\num{5} (kAlada 
\vi) baLika; taruvAya; anaMtara; Ada meVle; tadanaMtara: \eng{his family came after him} avana 
kuTuMbadavaru avanu baMda baLika baMdaru. \eng{a quarter after ten o'clock} (\ame) hatAtxda 
meVle kAlugaMTe; hatutxkAlu gaMTe. 
\num{6} (hiMde yA muMde, heVLiruvudanunx, barediruvudanunx 
yA meVlakxMDa yA keLakaMDa viSayagaLanunx) gaNanege tegedukoMDu; payARloVcisi. 
\num{7} 
(sAthxnamAna, pArxmuKayx, karxma, \mo vugaLalilx) AmeVlinavanAgi yA AmeVlinadAdxgi; 
anaMtaradavanAgi yA anaMtaradAdxgi; eraDaneya yA keLadajeRyavanAgi yA keLadajeRyadAdxgi: 
\eng{all the MP's come after the speaker} pAliRmeMTina sadasayxrelalx saBApatiyavara 
anaMtaradavaru. 
\num{8} anusAra(vAgi); anuguNavAgi; -aMte; -parxkAra: \eng{make me after 
thy will} ninanx iceCxganusAravAgi nananxnunx rUpisu. \eng{exactly after one's expectations} 
tananx niriVkaSxNegaLaMteyeV, niriVkaSxNegaLa parxkAraveV. 
\num{9} (AdashaRveMdu BAvisida 
vayxkitx, sheYli, pada, \mo vanunx) anukarisi; (AdashaRveMdu BAvisida pada \mo vugaLa) 
meVlapxMkitxyananxnusarisi; mAdariyaMte; mAdariya--meVrege, parxkAra: \eng{painting after da 
Vinci} Da viMciyanunx, Da viMciya kalAsheYliyanunx anukarisi bareda vaNaRcitarx. 
\eng{`aesthete' is formed after `athlete'--aesthete} eMba padavu \eng{athlete} padada mAdariya 
meVle rUpitavAdadudx. 
\num{10} (yAvudeV aitihAsika yA beVre bageya parxsidadhx GaTane \mo 
vugaLige) saMbaMdhapaTaTxMte; saMbaMdhisidaMte; sUcakavAgi: \eng{the martyrs monument is named 
after the heroes who died in the war} hutAtamxra sAmxraka eMba hesaru yudadhxdalilx maDida 
viVrara sUcakavAdadudx. 
\num{11} bayasi; udedxVshisi: \eng{I am after a good job} oLeLxya 
nwkari paDeyuvudu nananx udedxVsha. 
\num{12} A kAraNadiMda; tatapxriNAmavAgi: \eng{after 
that remark there's nothing more to say} A TiVkeya kAraNadiMda, inunx hecicxge heVLuvudeVnU 
ilalx.}}

\noindent
\gl{\pagu}
{\dictmeaning{
\num{1} \eng{after six months} Aru tiMgaLAda meVle; Aru tiMgaLu--kaLeduhoVda meVle, 
gatisida baLika. 
\num{2} \eng{hanker after (a person or thing)} (vayxkitxgAgi yA vasutxvigAgi 
hAtoreyutAtx) benanxTuTx; anusarisu. 
\num{3} \eng{hour after hour, day after day, month after 
month, year after year} (oMdAda meVle oMdu eMba athaRdalilx) gaMTeya meVle gaMTe, dinada meVle 
dina, tiMgaLa meVle tiMgaLu, vaSaRda meVle vaSaR. 
\num{4} \eng{page after page} puTa puTa; 
puTagaTaTxle; puTavAda meVle puTa.}}

\noindent
\gl{\nuga}
\dictmeaning{
\num{1} \eng{after all} aMtU; AdarU; kaDegAdarU; kaTaTxkaDegU; konegU: 

\alnum{a} (iSeTxlalx Ada, heVLida, kUDida, parishiVlisida) meVlU: \eng{you have done your worst, after 
all what does it matter?} ninanx keYlAda keDukanenxlAlx mADididxVye, AdarU EnAyutx mahA? 
\eng{he tried for one full hour and failed after all} oMdu iDiV gaMTe parxyatanx mADida, 
konegU viPalanAda. 

\alnum{b} (apAra parxyatanx, niriVkaSxNe, \mo vugaLu) Ada meVlU; AdarU: 
\eng{so you have come after all} (iSeTxlalx kAdu kAdu sAkAda meVlU) kaDegAdarU baMdeyalalx; baMdeVbiTiTxyalalx konegU! 
\num{2} \eng{after a fashion} asaDeDxyiMda; heVge heVgoV; 
aDADxdiDiDxyAgi; kATAcArakekx. 
\num{3} \eng{after one's (own) heart} mecucxgege, pirxVtige--pAtarxvAda, pAtarxvAgi; iSaTxvAda; iSaTxvAgi. 
\num{4} \eng{after you} (beVrobabx vayxkitxge 
mAyARdegAgi Adayxte koDuvalilx) tamamx anaMtara (nAnu); tAvAda meVle (nAnu). 
\num{5} \eng{after you with (something)} (\AmA) nimamx saradi baLika nanage saradi sigutatxdeyeV? 
\num{6} \eng{be after} gamanaviDu; ecacxra vahisu; kAyu; kaNiNxDu: \eng{you are so lazy, one must 
always be after you} niVneSuTx soVmAri eMdare, ninanx meVle sadA yArAdarU kaNiNxTiTxraleV 
beVku. 
\num{7} \eng{time after time} aneVka sala; eSoTxV satiR; halavAru bAri; halavomemx; 
meVliMda meVle: \eng{time after time I have helped him} nAnu avanige meVliMda meVle 
neravAgideVdxne 
\num{8} \eng{to look after} (vayxkitx, vasutx, \mo vanunx jAgarUkate, 
sAvadhAna, pirxVti, mamate, \mo vugaLiMda) kApADu; rakiSxsu; saMrakiSxsu; noVDiko: \eng{he 
looked after his aged parents with tenderness} avanu tananx vaqdadhx taMde tAyiyaranunx 
mamateyiMda noVDikoMDa.}

\bentry
\word{among(st)}
\pron{amaMgf(sfTx)}
\gl{\upa}
\dictmeaning{
\num{1} naDuve; madheyx: \eng{among(st) his unknown enemies} tanage gotitxrada 
shaturxgaLa naDuve. 
\num{2} oLage; -alilx; A mitiyalilx: \eng{five rupees among(st) us} 
namamxlilx aidu rUpAyigaLive. \eng{divided among(st) us} namomxLage haMcikeyAyitu. 
\num{3} 
daqSiTxyalilx; aBipArxyadalilx; AcaraNeyalilx: \eng{a person respected among(st) thinkers}
AloVcanAparara daqSiTxyalilx gwravavuLaLx vayxkitx. 
\num{4} sherxVSaThx; elalxrigiMta migilAda:
\eng{a poet among(st) poets} kavigaLalilx sherxVSaThxnAda kavi. 
\num{5} peYki; vagaRdalilx;
taMDadalilx guMpinalilx: \eng{name the best among(st) us} namamx guMpinalilx utatxmananunx 
hesarisu. 
\num{6} parasapxra; tamamx tamomxLage: \eng{they fought among(st) themselves} 
avaru tamamxtamomxLageV kAdADidaru. 
\num{7} oTuTxgUDi; elalx seVri; oTATxgi; oMdAgi: 
\eng{you killed him among(st) yourselves} niVvu oTuTxgUDi avananunx koMdiri. 
\num{8} hoVlisidAga; 
hoVlisidare: \eng{one among(st) many} (veYshiSaTxyXveVnU ilalxda) halavaralilx obabx; 
hatatxralilx hanonxMdu; aneVka vasutxgaLalilx oMdu.}

adu holigeya baLi siVLikoMDitu.}}

\alnum{a} (vayxkitxyanunx) tarATege tegeduko; CiVmAri hAku;
tiVkaSxNXvAgi KaMDisu: \eng{she was taken apart for her controversial stand} avaLa vivAdAsapxda niluvigAgi
